channel.title: yaml on Zachary Loeber
channel.description: Recent content in yaml on Zachary Loeber

item.title: The Declarative Mindset
item.description: I’m going to wax poetic on the virtues of declarative thinking within the IT industry. Along the way we will go over some definitions and introduce the pseudo-declarative manifest and how it can add value to a project.

item.title: Azure Devops Automated Variable Groups
item.description: In this article I’ll cover how one can automate creating and updating ADO libraries (aka. variable groups) using pipeline as code.

item.title: Hugo - A DevOps Approach
item.description: I’ve updated my site to use hugo some time ago. Recently I’ve found some time to add a deployment pipeline for this site as well. This short article will cover how the pipeline code works and dive into multi-stage pipelines.
